Package bounswe16group12.com.meanco.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HomeActivity
    The class where users see topics and their relations, go to their profile page, login/logout (depending on their current status), go to topic detail, add topic or relation.
    LoginActivity
    A login screen that offers login via email/password.
    LoginActivityTest  
    ProfileActivity
    Profile page specific to user.
    TagSearchActivity
    Tag search activity gets search results from WikiData by sending get requests to wikidata.org and then populated on a listview.
    TopicDetailActivity
    Topic detail activity has comments and tags of a topic.
    TopicSearchActivity
    Topic search activity searches local db and then populates the listview.
